name: Arlo The Rabbit
description: Welcome to Arlo's first adventure, in an old-school platformer fashion! Complete with amazing chiptune tracks!
minimum_requirements: OS: An old-school system handheld Processor: Custom 8-bit Sharp LR35902 at 4.19 MHz Graphics: 8 kB internal DirectX: Version 5.2 Storage: 219 MB available space Sound Card: 2 pulse wave generators, 1 PCM 4-bit wave sample Additional Notes: It should run on almost anything. Don't sweat it, dude.
recommended_requirements: OS: Any Windows OS Processor: Any Memory: 6094 MB RAM Graphics: Any DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 219 MB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Really, all you need is a Windows computer.
